subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
How are you? Hope you are keeping safe and Happy to meet with you.
My name is Mr Luis Josh Numbre. I am reaching you through your email because I was asked to contact you and Haven obtained your contact details from a reliable source as a potential partner. I am  searching for a good person to invest in your country.  We are a renowned investment-broking company agent and offer irresistible investment services and providers.  
We are by this email letter offering you an irresistible joint (Partnership) to allow us to have you as our representative and manager of investment funds partnership in your country within the time frame of the investment relationship.  Since we cannot determine whether this email is functional or valid and your willingness, we have kept this proposal brief.
We are in the hope to share this irresistible offer with you based on a partnership investment program within your country.  If you are interested in this partnership, please respond with your direct telephone and give us your full contact details plus your company profile, and in your response, we will send you an elaborate email with details of this kind of offer.  
Your expedient response will be appreciated.
Thank you.
Mr Luis Josh Numbre

subject: Re:   Dear Sir
body:
Hello Mr. Luis Josh Numbre,

I hope this message finds you well. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

Your proposal sounds interesting, but I would like to understand more about it before we proceed further. Could you please provide more details about the nature of the investment and what exactly my role would be? 

Also, could you tell me more about your company and its history? I'm always interested in learning about new businesses and their operations.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Greetings Mary


Thank you for your email you said you are interested, this kind of
investment is that we use this available cash to invest in your country
since the customer has died and no one came forward for this money, there
is this secret i want to tell you but did not want to disclose in my
previous email to you before, now i want to use this opportunity to inform
you that my client Arab lady has passed away at old age, over 101 years
without a child, but i had the opportunity to have work with her for many
years and the money is deposited in the bank in a private bank  in  CANADA
BANK secretly with names as the beneficiary, as her investment broker i was
able to have all the details of the bank and the account officer directly
who is Mr Hassan the banker who has been working with her as her account
officer.

Therefore, I want us to share and keep this little secret between us, the
bank will not know because i have told them that you and i have been long
acquainted, this is to avoid any eyebrow to the funds in the bank,  do not
let anybody know about this money except you and me, I trust you now and i
know you will invest this money very well, the total sum of USD $59.9M is
available for collection, if you present the last deposit receipt or  ESIN
CODE NUMBER and change of ownership that i will obtained in your name as
the next of kin to my late client to verify which i will make available to
you which will enable the bank to transfer the funds to you via a wire
bank-to-bank, and we will share 50% for you when you receive credit then
you will send 40% for us while you use the remaining 10% for expenses and
local bank taxes in your country.

In view of the above, this is urgent as the bank in  CANADA , wants to take
over these funds to another person since no one is coming for it, you need
to do something fast to get these funds out from the bank in CANADA to
avoid raising an eyebrow on this money, as the investment facilitator.

Once i hear from you i will give you contact of Mr Hassan the banker so
that you will  ask him how fast this will take to be transferred to your
account, how many days or hours it will take and what will you do to make
it fast because i do not want this money to stay in CANADA till next week
Friday. .

Promise me that you will keep it secret.

Sincerely,

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Mr. Luis Josh Number
